item.description:
Vegan Potluckat a Manchester Arms Park. Meet near the river behind Milly's Tavern at 500 S Commercial.

I hope somebody can do something about the wind, rain, flash flood forecast for Saturday.

It will be possible to move the event to Homewood Suites at 1000 N. Perimeter Road; this hotel in effect rents apartments with full kitchens. If it is raining cats and dogs at 12:00PM tomorrow letâ€™s meet at Milly's Tavern and plot strategy.
item.name: The Manchester Vegan May Meetup
